description.x-y:
The user takes a defensive stance while it protects
itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack
stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user takes a defensive stance while it protects
itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack
stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:

description.sword-shield:
The user takes a defensive stance while it protects
itself from damage. It also lowers the Attack stat of any
attacker that makes direct contact.

effect.full: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.
effect.shortEffect: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.
